product_name: Mountain Khakis Peaks Flannel Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: For natural warmth with a touch of stretch and a western look, you can't beat the women's Mountain Khakis Peaks Flannel Shirt. It'll take you hiking, camping or lassoing in cool weather. Polyester/wool/spandex blend gives you durability, natural temperature regulation and stretch. Chest pockets each have a flap with 2 buttons. Contrast plaid fabric inside collar and on side gussets; shaping darts at chest. Mountain Khakis Peaks Flannel Shirt for women is garment washed for softness. Closeout.
short_description: For natural warmth with a touch of stretch and a western look, you can't beat the women's Mountain Khakis Peaks Flannel Shirt. It'll take you hiking, camping or lassoing in cool weather.
